issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

status.description: The issue is open and ready for the assignee to start work on it.
status.name: Open

fields.description:
Steps to reproduce:
* Click on Nodes. This page will list nodes of the cluster
* Select a node which has running container
* Select 'list of containers'
* Select any one of the logs link  like stdout or stderr. Logs link appear properly
* Click back on the browser to go to container page again
* Select any other logs link

The Url prompts "Sorry, Error Occurred."
{code}
jquery.js:8630 XMLHttpRequest cannot load http://ipaddress:â€¦e/containerlogs/container_1469893274276_0261_01_000009/launch_container.sh. fields.summary: Logs of container loads first time but fails if you go back and click again
